replies.txt_content:
就是把Json加进tellraw，用cc菜单触发
比如cc触发一个["",{"text":"点击我氪金！","color":"gold","bold":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"www.你的充值网址.com"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"对就是点击我啊~~","color":"dark_green"}]}}}]
-
或者你可以打进命令方块预览一下，
在命令方块里面输入/tellraw @p ["",{"text":"点击我氪金！","color":"gold","bold":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"www.你的充值网址.com"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"对就是点击我啊~~","color":"dark_green"}]}}}]并触发看看效果。

replies.txt_content:
哦我日刚才的排版太丑了，再发一遍
实际上就是用cc触发一个tellraw指令。
举个例子，比如点击访问网站json就是
["",{"text":"点击我氪金！","color":"gold","bold":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"www.你的充值网址.com"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"对就是点击我啊~~","color":"dark_green"}]}}}]复制代码
不过你也可以用命令方块触发试试效果
比如把这段指令粘进命令方块以后触发看看效果
/tellraw @p ["",{"text":"点击我氪金！","color":"gold","bold":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"www.你的充值网址.com"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"对就是点击我啊~~","color":"dark_green"}]}}}]复制代码嘛就是这样..(赚30金粒真不容易啊233
